text:
Teen Mom’s Ryan Edwards Resurfaces on Father’s Day Weekend After Rehab Stint

Ryan Edwards appears to be on the road to a healthier lifestyle. Close to one month after E! News confirmed that the Teen Mom star had entered rehab, Maci Bookout’s ex has reemerged…

http://ift.tt/2sk2P4l
